meta.title: Metabaron-Uncensored-8B
meta.description: A Cog-packaged LLaMA 3.1 8B model fine-tuned for uncensored text generation. Uses llama.cpp and is optimized for local inference. Packaged by Metabaron.

input.description: Text prompt for the model to generate a response from.
Seed for reproducibility. Same prompt + seed = same output.
